post.author: 최덕선
post.content:
Learn how to link Microsoft .NET and J2EE, using Web services, runtime bridges, and asynchronous techniques. Microsoft presents interoperability best practices, and illustrates these approaches with a functional sample applications.
http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/dnpag/html/jdni.asp
post.title: Application Interoperability: Microsoft .NET and J2EE
